project.projectDescription: Food Choices of Students in College: The dataset provided will show data regarding food choices and the types of students that make them. The data will be cleaned prior to use. This dataset includes information on food choices, nutrition, preferences, childhood favorites, and other information from college students. There are 126 responses from students. The data provided allows me to research the association between eating out and gender. We will use simple linear regression and multiple linear regression to review the association.
project.dataDescription: The data set is made up of 126 responses by students from the Mercyhurst University. The data set provided has 61 columns however will focus on the following columns: Students that cook, Gender, and Eating out.
project.researchQuestion: What is the strength of the correlation between eating out and gender? What is the strength of the correlation between eating out, gender and those that cook.
project.conclusion: The P value of students that cook is large. The p Value of students by gender is also large. At the alpha =.05 level, this shows there is very little correlation between those students that eat our and those that cook or by their gender.
